name: HeaderCons - Add icons to deviantART's header bar!
description: Add some color to deviantART's header bar with HeaderCons! It has always somewhat bothered me that Messages is the only menu item accompanied by an icon, so I decided to create a user style that adds icons to all of them! This not only makes the menu look a whole lot more eye-candy, but boosts its usability as well, as each item becomes more easily recognizable.
